item.title: Solidity Gas Optimizations Cheat Sheet
item.description: This article is going to give you a couple of tips to reduce gas consumption in your .
item.author: dharmikgangani786@gmail.com (Dharmik Gangani)

item.title: Detects vulnerable Solidity code with Slither
item.description: Slither is a static analysis framework for smart contracts, it enables developers to find vulnerabilities in their solidity smart contracts code in a few seconds, it can also be used for code optimization or review.
item.author: dharmikgangani786@gmail.com (Dharmik Gangani)

item.title: Apple and the case for competition.
item.description: The EU announced plans to force all devices – including iPhones – to use a common charging port.
